title: IEndCapFeatureData.UseChamferCorners
description: Gets or sets whether to chamfer the corners of this end-cap feature.
returns: True to chamfer corners, false to fillet corners
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IEndCapFeatureData::UseCornerTreatment
is true.
Call
IEndCapFeatureData::ChamferDistance
to set the chamfer distance or fillet radius of the end cap corner.
